column4: Welcome, you are now talking to an AI doctor. As I am part of a scientific experiment, I would appreciate it if you could take the time to answer a super short questionnaire at the end of the interview. Tap Speak to ask your question and then tap Send to submit it to me.
Unfortunately, cancer exists due to the mutations of healthy cells that occur over time. These mutations can cause certain cells in the body to start growing and multiplying out of control.
Why was there a need for a COVID vaccination?

The need for a COVID vaccination is due to the fact that the virus is very contagious and can be quite severe. Having a vaccine helps to protect people from getting the virus and possibly developing severe symptoms, as well as potentially transmitting the virus to others.
